product_name: The North Face Grizzly Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Grizzly jacket for women combines Polartec(R) Grizzly high loft fleece and Power Stretch(R) panels to offer an amazing warmth-to-weight ratio for backcountry adventures. Inspired by bear fur, Silky Polartec(R) Thermo Pro(R) Grizzly fleece combines textures and pile lengths to trap warmth close to the body. Grizzly fleece offers optimum temperature regulation and ideal packability. Power Stretch panels breathe and let you reach and stretch easily. The North Face Grizzly jacket features an overlay zippered chest pocket and two zippered hand pockets, plus a hem cinch-cord.
short_description: The North Face Grizzly jacket for women combines Polartec(R) Grizzly high loft fleece and Power Stretch(R) panels to offer an amazing warmth-to-weight ratio for backcountry adventures.
